sourcesContent: import { useTheme } from "@emotion/react"; import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import Logo from "../../assets/logo/logo-imagen.png"; import TwitterIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Twitter"; import InstagramIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Instagram"; function Footer() { const { palette: { primary }, } = useTheme(); return ( About Us Contact Us Grading Shipping Terms ); } export default Footer;
